item.title: Palm Springs
item.description: Who doesn’t love a good time loop movie/episode? Especially a crude (at times) time loop + romantic comedy. Nyles: I guess you followed me. It’s one of those infinite time loop situations you might have heard about. Sarah: That I might have heard about? Nyles: Yeah. I think that’s pretty much the best part about the movie: there is more than one person trapped in and aware of the loop and Nyles at least is perfectly genre aware.
